channel.title: Back Again from the Broken Land (Two Shot)
channel.description:
CONTENT WARNING: Violence, loss, tragedy, emotional entanglements.
DESCRIPTION: You are little people who walked into a big war. The Doomslord’s forces were gathered in the Broken Land, and for some reason your small fellowship played a key role in their fall. Now, lad- en with stories to tell and burdens to bear, you set off on the journey home. But the Doomslord’s Hunters are still out there, and it’s a long way to walk... Back again from the Broken Land.
SPECIAL REQUEST: RSVP is reserved for the first 72 hours for players new to the Gauntlet, people of color, LGBTQIA, and non-he/him cis folks.
RSVP OPEN ACCESS TIME: 1-1-21 8:00 PM PST
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: There will be 2 sessions. Being able to attend both sessions is not required but preferred.
NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 3 plus the GM.
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: CATS, tone discussion, Lines & Veils, X Card, open door policy, and the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html). SET UP INFO: Streamyard, Roll for Your Party, Google Sheets BREAKS: 2 x 10 minute breaks on the hour RECORDED: With permission at the beginning and end of each session. PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
Pt 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPh2__mg-j-9XvSFAw6 Pt 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPh2mc22w3O-ubWRBz9
